ComicInfo.Summary: Crown Heights Part 2: Sara and Gretchen uncover a group of young rabbinical students who have constructed a golem for protection against the Crown Heights killer. The killer strikes again, however, and forensics discovers that a horse is somehow involved. As Gretchen once again begins to secretly follow Sara, she is attacked by a demonic rider on a horse. One of Dani's dancing students tells her about her abusive boyfriend and then kisses her.
ComicInfo.Tags: Sara Pezzini,Witchblade,New York State,New York City,Finch,Detective Gleason,Gretchen Fullmer,Danielle Baptiste,Marinette Bwa Chech
ComicInfo.Title: Crown Heights Part 2
